highlights: Developed a full-featured personal blogging platform using Ruby on Rails and PostgreSQL, supporting content creation, publishing workflows, and community interaction through a server-rendered architecture.
Implemented rich content management with Action Text, Active Storage, and FriendlyId to enable formatted posts, media uploads, and SEO-friendly URLs.
Designed social interaction features including nested comments, likes, friendships, and follow workflows to support user engagement and content discovery.
Integrated authentication, pagination, and performance-oriented UI behavior using Devise, Pagy, Turbo Rails, and Stimulus to improve usability and maintainability.
